subject: Football
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s chief of security denied Thursday that he had received a copy of a video that showed Rice, a former Baltimore Ravens running back, knocking out his fiancée in an elevator in Atlantic City.
snippet: The N.F.L.’s chief of security denied Thursday that he had received a copy of a video that showed Rice, a former Baltimore Ravens running back, knocking out his fiancée in an elevator in Atlantic City.
